participant_1.background:
I am a student who is not well-liked.
i am an ovo vegetarian.
i like to make boats on the weekends.
I am afraid to tell my parents how I feel about my job because I know they will be disappointed.
I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.

participant_2.background:
I listen to the Beatles to lift my spirits.
I drink far too much soda, which is not good for my health.
I prefer not to have pets since my home is my sanctuary and I need it to be a quiet place.
my family is very important to me.
i love animals and i want to help them.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I'm doing okay. I'm just a little worried about my job.
Well, I'm not really enjoying it and I'm afraid to tell my parents because I know they'll be disappointed.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I know how you feel. I've been in a similar situation before.
It's just hard because I don't know what to do. I don't want to let my parents down, but I also don't want to be miserable at my job.
Well, I think you should talk to your parents about it. They might be able to help you figure out what to do.
I'm not sure if I can do that. I'm just so afraid of what they'll say.
I know it's scary, but it might be the best thing to do. They might be able to help you find a new job that you'll enjoy more.
I don't know. I'll think about it.
Okay, just remember that I'm here for you if you need anything.
